title: Bilingual kids
creator_credit: Victoria. Dept. of Education and Early Childhood Development and James Mann
brief_description: This program is designed to introduce teachers, parents and communities to the concept of bilingual education. It looks at processes involved in the implementation of the Greek:English Bilingual Pilot Project in the Richmond-Collingwood area. A number of evaluation findings are also discussed
